properties.name: Sejel Khajuria
properties.description: Posted by YogastudioKensingtonI teach Hatha and Vinyasa Yoga, deep relaxation and meditation. My teaching style is meditative but challenging, & adapted to the students. I am qualified by the British Wheel of Yoga, the Governing Body for Yoga in the UK & have been practicing Yoga for 20 years. My influences include the Bihar School of Yoga, the dedicated yogis in my family, and trips to India. Group lessons in Covent Garden, Finchley and Kensington and Privates at your home/work/school or at my studio in Kensington
